```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(datasets.load)
```

get the ones I already have

```{r}
desc0 <- readLines("descriptions.Rmd")
desc0 %>% as_tibble() %>% 
  extract(value, into = c("dataset", "description", "technique"), 
          regex = "^([^ ]*) (.*)\\. (.*)$") -> desc
desc
```


get all datasets

```{r}
d <- datasets()
```

select random rows of d, not including the ones I already got

```{r}
d %>% slice_sample(n = 10) %>% 
  unite(ds, Package, Item, sep = "::") %>% 
  anti_join(desc, by = c("ds"="dataset"))
```
